title: Musks AI Side Gig Should Keep Its Distance From Tesla

title: Weight Loss Drug Safe, Effective For Children Under 12, Shows New Study
content: A weight loss drug has been found to be broadly safe and effective for children under 12 with obesity, according to a small study on Wednesday that was cautiously welcomed by outside experts.

title: Energy Drinks And Caffeine Craze Comes At A Cost For Impoverished Afghans
content: A production line in a warehouse in western Afghanistan churns out 24 energy drinks every second, feeding a thirst for the tonic used to mask life's hardships and lift wilting spirits.
summary: A production line in a warehouse in western Afghanistan churns out 24 energy drinks every second, feeding a thirst for the tonic used to mask life's hardships and lift wilting spirits.
